thread.title: Kapil Sharma Reportedly Made These Bollywood Stars Wait For 5 Hours
thread.title_full: Kapil Sharma Reportedly Made These Bollywood Stars Wait For 5 Hours

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Kapil Sharma Reportedly Made These Bollywood Stars Wait For 5 Hours
text:
Sukriti Gumber Jan . 6 . 2017 Shraddha Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapoor 
The new (or perhaps old) jaanus in town- Aditya Roy Kapoor and Shraddha Kapoor are currently on a promotional spree for their upcoming film, OK Jaanu . Now, itâ€™s no news that The Kapil Sharma Show is a mandatory promotional ground for most Bollywood films and many celebrities consider it an important platform. Kapil Sharma Shraddha and Aditya reportedly reached TKSS sets at the scheduled time, i.e. 4 pm. But on their arrival, there were no signs of the shoot commencing anytime soon, due to which they had to wait for five hours before the shoot finally started. 
According to an entertainment portal, Shraddha was quite upset and even threatened to walk out. A source was also quoted saying that Aditya and Shraddha initially waited patiently, but later they were quite miffed with the makers. The shooting reportedly finally began after 5 hours, around 9 pm, and went on till late night. 68
